content: I've created an issue here detailing the inconsistencies in wording on the settings tab. Thoughts? (i hope it's not another duplicate haha)

@Yashashvi Dave and @Balaji are working on fixing this :). Great eye though!

One area that is in need of a pass for simple, consistent language is our integrations docs. (the stuff linked to by all the boxes at https://chat.zulip.org/integrations/)
